content.query:
DROP TABLE [dbo].[DimCustomers_FourthCoffee]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimCustomers_FourthCoffee]
( 
	[SourceSytemID] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[CustomerSK] [varchar](255)  NOT NULL,
	[CustomerID] [uniqueidentifier]  NOT NULL,
	[LastName] [varchar](255)  NOT NULL,
	[FirstName] [varchar](255)  NOT NULL,
	[AddressLine1] [varchar](255)  NOT NULL,
	[AddressLine2] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[City] [varchar](255)  NOT NULL,
	[State] [char](255)  NOT NULL,
	[ZipCode] [char](255)  NOT NULL,
	[PhoneNumber] [char](200)  NOT NULL,
	[RecordStartDate] [date]  NOT NULL,
	[RecordEndDate] [date]  NULL,
	[ActiveFlag] [bit]  NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
